text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG GX531GM-DH74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Elden Ring. The build quality of the ASUS ROG GX531GM-DH74 15.6" 144 Hz Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
